column4: does anyone have any experience configuring a ATI Radeon AIW 8500, it keeps losing the display settings everyonce in a while when i reboot, it will say im running in a low resolution mode and I cant get the ATI drivers installed and I have no idea what drivers it is using or what drivers to use for my card
Ditch ATI and get a nVidia chipset.
I will the next comp i get
Smart move. And sorry. I have no experience with ATI cards.
